Adult.description: Boreal Owls are slightly larger than Northern Saw-whet Owls, with a crisp dark border going most of the way around the face. Boreal's facial disk is clean white, whereas Saw-whet's is tinged with buff.

Adult gray morph (Northern).description: Eastern Screech-Owls have small ear tufts while Northern Saw-whet Owls have round heads without ear tufts. Screech-owls also have more finely marked underparts.

Adult.description: Western Screech-Owls have small ear tufts while Northern Saw-whet Owls have round heads without ear tufts. Screech-owls also have more finely marked underparts.

Adult (Northern).description: Barred Owls are much larger than Northern Saw-whet Owls (nearly three times their size), and they have brown (not yellow) eyes and darker faces.
